word: Be of good courage. . . . The Lord will be with you at every step if you will be with Him. . . . Understand, my dear brother and sister, that you are very dear to me. . . . Do your best, and God will expect no more.--Letter 113, 1902, pp. 5, 12, 13. (To Brother and Sister G. A. Irwin, June 15, 1902.)
